I was just cleaning Robin's saw."/pause 400/faceDirection Robin 3/pause 500/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Robin "$q 66 null#Did you ever woodwork, as she did?#$r 66 50 event_wood1#Yes#$r 66 50 event_wood2#No"/pause 500/speak Robin "I believe, as you were a friend of hers, she would've wanted you to have this."/move Robin 2 0 1/pause 600/playSound openBox/pause 600/move Robin -2 0 2/pause 400/playMusic none/playSound coin/pause 1500/playSound reward/addCraftingRecipe Flute Block/addCraftingRecipe Drum Block/message "Learned how to craft 'Flute Block' and 'Drum Block'"/pause 700/speak Robin "You can use these to make music on your farm.#$b#I'm sure an evergreen spirit such as yourself will find a creative use for them.$h"/pause 700/end
